mapper.select: select eats.seq ,eats.type ,eats.name ,eats.timeStart ,eats.timeEnd ,eats.number ,eats.site ,eats.pakingNy ,eats.bookingNy ,eats.freecallNy ,eats.eatsDesc ,eats.date ,eats.fixDate from eats eats order by eats.seq desc

select eats.seq ,eats.type ,eats.name ,eats.timeStart ,eats.timeEnd ,eats.number ,eats.site ,eats.pakingNy ,eats.bookingNy ,eats.freecallNy ,eats.eatsDesc ,eats.date ,eats.fixDate from eats eats where 1=1 and eats.seq = #{seq}
